sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../service/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-productview', templateUrl: './productview.component.html', styleUrls: ['./productview.component.css'] }) export class ProductviewComponent implements OnInit{ productlist!:any; constructor(private api:ApiService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.api.getlist().subscribe((x)=>{ console.log(x); this.productlist=x; }) } }
{{productlist|json}}
